DOC.brief_summary: SSRI's has been demonstrated to be partially effective in schizophrenia and OCD. We therefore suggest that Escitalopram up to 20 mg /d in those patients could be effective in reducing obsessive compulsive symptomatology
DOC.brief_title: Escitalopram in Schizophrenia in OCD- Open Label Study
DOC.criteria: Patients who suffer from schizophrenia and OCD Substance abuse, Serious medical condintions, Being on SSRI treatment
